TEXT.TITLE: BANGLADESH TENDERS FOR TWO MLN BARRELS PETROLEUM
TEXT.BODY: Bangladesh Petroleum Corp said it floated an international tender for imports of two mln barrels of Jet Kero, Superior Kero and High Speed Diesel for shipment during January-June 1988. It said the offer for the petroleum products would be open until 0600 gmt on November 19. REUTER
